_installation: 1. Copy this file to your remote machine
2. Remove the '_instructions' section from the JSON
3. Place the cleaned JSON file as .mcp.json in your project directory
4. OR merge the mcpServers section into your existing .mcp.json
_memory_tools: store_memory - Store memories with categories (project, conversation, agent, global)
search_memories - Semantic search across all memories
retrieve_memory - Get specific memory by ID
get_recent_memories - Get recent memories by time window
